name: biimpr

stmt.origin: sylbi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0), wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0))
-| wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin: |- wb(wb(w0, w1), wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin: |- wi(wn(wi(wi(w0, w1), wn(wi(w1, w0)))), wi(w1, w0))

comment: Property of the biconditional connective. (Contributed by NM, 11-May-1999.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-Nov-2012.)
